abstract: While some say the central bank’s safety-net role has rightfully been scaled back, the head of the New York Fed argues that it should be expanded.
snippet: While some say the central bank’s safety-net role has rightfully been scaled back, the head of the New York Fed argues that it should be expanded.
lead_paragraph: 5:33 p.m. | Updated to reflect alternative solutions proposed by the New York Fed chief.

headline.main: Equipping the Fed for a Future Crisis

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
